attributes.additional_details:
The age for taking responsibility for crime is 10 years of age!

People over the age of 10 should be able to vote because at the moment only over 18's are allowed to vote, I'm just 13 years of age and I am interested in Politics and, if I could vote UKIP, And I'm sure that other people feel similar.

How come We can't vote for rules that we have to obey, it's like the suffragettes all over again, but with myself as this champaign's founder and leader we will succeed just as the women of the First World War did.
